name: Nyx Shadowstep
worldview: Power is everything, Secrecy is safety
quirks: Whispers to his shadow, Keeps a journal of dark rituals
motivations: Gain ultimate power, Uncover forbidden secrets
likes: Dark places, Arcane symbols, Forbidden knowledge
backstory: Nyx was born under ominous circumstances, marked by his infernal heritage. His quest for power led him to form a pact with a dark entity, granting him formidable magical abilities. He navigates the world through shadows, always seeking to expand his power and knowledge.
